heading: school shooting
subheading: at least five students were shot early on monday at fort gibson middle school in eastern oklahoma. no deaths were reported and several of the victims were said to be in stable condition. a suspect has been taken into police custody, reportedly a 13-year-old male student from the school. fort gibson is a small town of about 3,500 people 50 miles southeast of tulsa. a school official said all of the district's 1,850 students would be released early on monday because of the shooting.
author: wired staff
text: at least five students were shot early on monday at fort gibson middle school in eastern oklahoma. no deaths were reported and several of the victims were said to be in stable condition. a suspect has been taken into police custody, reportedly a 13-year-old male student from the school. fort gibson is a small town of about 3,500 people 50 miles southeast of tulsa. a school official said all of the district's 1,850 students would be released early on monday because of the shooting.
